Class Assignment

java.lang.Object
edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.gradebook.NotableImpl
edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.gradebook.Assignment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Notable
public class Assignment extends NotableImpl
This class represents an assignment give to students in The Joy of Coding.
Author:
David Whitlock
